oracle.jbo.common
Class ResourceFactoryManager

java.lang.Object
  oracle.jbo.common.ResourceFactoryManager

public class ResourceFactoryManager
extends java.lang.Object

A manager class used to register and unregister ResourceFactories based on NameSpace

          registerResourceFactory registers the ResourceFactory (adds the ResourceFactory to the registryMap)
 void unregisterResourceFactory(java.lang.String namespace)
